title: Beauty How To Make Your Box Braids & Cornrows Look Even Cooler by Khalea Underwood yesterday
content: We could go on and on about the many benefits of protective styles . They give your hair a break from hot tools and product buildup, plus they're so easy to maintain . Aside from the technical stuff, they also look really effing cool. We've already seen how Lupita Nyong'o has transformed the bob, but some people still want their long, flowing braids, twists, and faux locs for the summer — and we can't blame 'em. If you're going long, now is a great time to channel your inner African goddess and add beads to your look.
